resources.string:
Please read this one-time usage note!

Remember the Redbox! can automatically connect to Redbox.com to download movies that you have rented.

To set up Redbox Automatic Update, please touch the button at the bottom of the \'My Rentals\' screen.

If you don\'t want to use Redbox Automatic Update, you can still enter movies manually by touching the \'New Rental\' button at the top of the screen.

Thanks!

Remember the Redbox! version {{version}}
